mapper.select: SELECT t1.`make_date` as make_date, t1.`bar_code` as bar_code, t1.`name` as name, t1.`make_count` as make_count, t1.`make_half_count` as make_half_count, t1.`back_count` as back_count, t1.`remark` as remark FROM DayMakeProducts t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT bar_code, MAX(make_date) AS max_make_date FROM DayMakeProducts GROUP BY bar_code ) t2 ON t1.bar_code = t2.bar_code AND t1.make_date = t2.max_make_date
